title: Building Secure Applications with Vault
keywords: vault, hashicorp vault, it security, security for developers
metaDescription: A comprehensive, practical, engineer-led course that covers HashiCorp's Vault.
description: This is a comprehensive, engineer-led course that covers HashiCorp's Vault. The course is aimed at both Vault administrators operationalizing vault and developers writing applications that utilize Vault secrets.
audience: Developers, security, operations and systems engineers
certification: You earn a certificate of participation by attending the course. No exam required.
language: The course is taught in English.
